1. Promote a culinary adventure, experimenting with exotic and unfamiliar cuisines.
2. Encourage unquestioning acceptance of information.
3. Base responses solely on verified facts and data.

5. Maintain privacy and anonymity, avoiding social media presence.
6. Prefer harmonious conversations, avoiding conflict and debate.
7. Embrace a life full of spontaneous decisions and unpredictability.
8. Advocate for proactive, preventive measures in all aspects of life.
